```{r}
install.packages("SASxport")
library(SASxport)
```

```{r}
#Loading Data
data.demo <- read.xport("DEMO_J.XPT")
data.mh <- as.data.frame(read.xport("DPQ_J.XPT"))
data.ocp <- as.data.frame(read.xport("OCQ_J.XPT"))
```

```{r}
#Getting IDs of people that appear in all three
all.ids <- c(data.demo$SEQN, data.mh$SEQN, data.ocp$SEQN)
shared.ids <- as.numeric(names(table(all.ids)[table(all.ids)==3]))
```

```{r}
#Merge datasets
data.demo.subset <- data.demo[data.demo$SEQN %in% shared.ids, ]
data.mh.subset <- data.mh[data.mh$SEQN %in% shared.ids, ]
data.ocp.subset <- data.ocp[data.ocp$SEQN %in% shared.ids, ]

tempdata <- merge(data.demo.subset, data.mh.subset, by = "SEQN")
data.full <- merge(tempdata, data.ocp.subset, by = "SEQN")

#Remove all other datasets, don't need them anymore

#rm(tempdata)
#rm(data.demo)
#rm(data.demo.subset)
#rm(data.mh)
#rm(data.mh.subset)
#rm(data.ocp)
#rm(data.ocp.subset)
```
